title: Gamification-Based Information Management Competency Enhancement Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational information management concepts and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Customized education for office/administrative professionals, structured around work-integrated case studies.

learning_goals: Learners can resolve 80% or more of information classification problems occurring in workplace environments within 8 weeks via gamification missions.
Learners improve information retrieval efficiency by 50% or more by developing proficiency in digital information management tools.
Learners propose at least three peer feedback-based information system improvement plans through collaborative missions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
